hero.tagline: All Paces. All Smiles. Just Show Up.

story.label: Our Story
story.title: More Than Just Running
story.description: Bingham’s easy-going Sunday run. No memberships or fees—just turn up! All paces welcome and we never leave anyone behind. Dogs, strollers, bikes, and kids are all welcome.

merch.title: Club Merch
merch.description: Look the part with our official club gear.
merch.note: Available to purchase at the run. Cash or card accepted.
